p.s: The add-on to HTML_QuickForm package that allows building of multipage forms
p.d: The package is essentially an implementation of a PageController pattern. Architecture: * Controller class that examines HTTP requests and manages form values persistence across requests. * Page class (subclass of QuickForm) representing a single page of the form. * Business logic is contained in subclasses of Action class. Cool features: * Includes several default Actions that allow easy building of multipage forms. * Includes usage examples for common usage cases (single-page form, wizard, tabbed form).
